data.name: Ajman Chamber of Commerce and Industry
data.description: There is Commercial and Industrial search. You can also use an online enquiry form to find necessary data. There are contact details of Ajman Chamber and heads of its sectors.

data.name: Abu Dhabi Commercial Directory
data.description: Register includes Unified, Mem No, company name, city, telephone, email.

data.name: Ajman Free Zone Authority
data.description: Use Authority's website to find its address, email and call center contacts.

data.name: Dubai Chamber of Commerce and Industry - Commercial Directory
data.description: Register includes company name, P.O. box number, address, telephone.

data.name: Dubai Financial Services Authority - Public Register
data.description: Includes DFSA reference number, address, telephone.

data.name: Dubai International Financial Centre
data.description: Register includes Reg Number, Activity, Company Name, Telephone, Address, etc.

data.name: Fujairah Free Zone Company Listing
data.description: There is no search available, but there is a listing of companies with telephone and fax numbers

Available only in German. Access can be obtained by using services of special companies like http://www.advokat.at/Advokat-Online/Module/Firmenbuch.aspx that are entitled to provide it (for full list see https://www.justiz.gv.at/web2013/html/default/2c9484852308c2a601240b693e1c0860.de.html)
data.name: Firmenbuch (the Ministry of Justice of Austria)
Fujairah Chamber of Commerce and Industry
data.description: Chamber of Commerce and Industry can be contacted via form on the website, phone, fax, email, address.

data.name: Hamriyah Free Zone Authority
data.description: Register contains company name, PO box, telephone, email, license number, activity, etc.

data.name: RAK Investment Authority
data.description: There is no open registry but you can make an enquiry via contact form or telephone call.

data.name: Sharjah Airport International Free Zone
data.description: Register contains company name, business type, telephone, email, PO box.

data.name: Sharjah Chamber of Commerce and Industry:Business Directory
data.description: Use business directory search or make an inquiry via form on the website.

data.name: Umm al-Quwain Chamber of Commerce and Industry
data.description: Register includes company name, P.O. box, address, activity, registration date.

data.name: Afghanistan Central Business Registry
data.description: Website not yet searchable

data.name: Banque Carrefour des entreprises / Kruispuntbank van ondernemingen
Au Greffe du Tribunal de Commerce Francophone de Bruxelles
data.description: The Registry of the Francophone Brussels Commercial Court

data.name: Единният идентификационен код (ЕИК)/Unified identification code (UIC)
data.description: A unified code which certifies the legality of one's business and under which one's company is signed in the National Statistics Agency

data.name: Unified State Register of Legal Entities and Individual Entrepreneurs (Ministry of Justice of the Republic of Belarus)
data.description: Information is available only in Belarusian language, contains Registration number, Registration authority, Date of registration, etc.

data.name: Canadian Revenue Agency / Agence du revenu du Canada
data.description: CRA_ACR is legal requirement for bilingual use

data.name: Swiss Commercial Register (via Zefix)
data.description: The Federal Office of Justice maintains Zefix for the purpose of accessing the companies decentrally recorded in the cantonal databases. Access to general company information is free of charge. The entries and changes in the Commercial Registry are published in the Swiss Official Gazette of Commerce and on the Internet (http://zefix.admin.ch/shab).

data.name: State Administration for Industry and Commerce (SAIC)
data.description: The database is only available in Chinese language

data.name: Bogota Chamber of Commerce
data.description: The Bogota Chamber of Commerce is a private, non-for-profit organization whose goal is to foster a sustainable Bogota-Region in the long term, by promoting its residents' prosperity, through services which enhance and strengthen the enterprise capabilities present in the region, and which improve the business environment with an impact over public policies.

data.name: Cyprus Department of Registrar of Companies and Official Receiver (DRCOR)
data.description: Data includes:Name, Reg. Number, Type, Registration Date, Organisation Status

data.name: Access to Registers of Economic Subjects / Entities (ARES)
data.description: Public registers comprising:the Commercial Register, the Federal Register, the Register of Foundations, the Register’s Institute, and the Register of Public Service Companies. Information on companies is searchable in English and is free-of-charge.

data.name: Common Register Portal of the German Federal States (CRP)
data.description: Any search for a company and retrieving of published information is free of charge. For any other information you will be charged a fee upon a respective notice.

data.name: Danish Central Business Register
data.description: The Central Business Register at Virk is available with English headings and categories. It can be used to search for information on all Danish businesses.

data.name: Centre of Registers and Information Systems (RIK)
data.description: You can view the data related to you free-of-charge by logging in with your ID-card.

data.name: Common Directory of Organizational Units and Offices - DIR3
data.description: EXCEL Tables: http://administracionelectronica.gob.es/ctt/resources/Soluciones/238/Area%20descargas/Listado%20Oficinas%20AGE.xlsx?idIniciativa=238&idElemento=2745

data.name: Commercial Register of the Kingdom of Spain
data.description: The Central Mercantile Register offers two methods of obtaining information about registered companies and/or company names:1) USERS WITHOUT AGREEMENT. - They should pay the corresponding legal tax by credit card. 2) USERS WITH AGREEMENT.- They must use the password assigned by the Central Mercantile Register after the Agreement has been signed.

data.name: Ministry of Foreign Affairs
data.description: Charities are registered but no openly searchable database yet available.

data.name: The National Institute of Statistics and Economic Studies / Institute National de la Statistique et des etudes economiques
data.description: The National Institute of Statistics and Economic Studies provide a registration service for companies and associations with details being held on the SIRENE database

data.name: Registre de Commerce et des Societies /Trade and Companies Register - Commercial Court Registry
Edubase, by the Department of Education
data.description: Edubase is provided by the Department of Education and provides a URN for each school, university and other educational establishment in England and Wales

data.name: UK Government Departments Reference Numbers
data.description: Codes for use by IATI for UK Government Departments.

data.name: UK Government Departments, Agencies & Public Bodies
data.description: Use the final segment of the url (below /organisations) as the "registration number", converting all "-" to "_". Keep "registration number" portion all lowercase.

data.name: The Charity Commission for Northern Ireland
The Guernsey Registry at the Department of Commerce and Employment
Közösségi adószám/ VAT ID (Ministry of Justice of Hungary)
data.description: Közösségi adószám serves as both tax number and VAT ID. No abbreviation is used.

data.name: Ministry Home affairs/ Kementerian Dalam Negeri
data.description: NGO registration can also be done through Ministry Home affairs/ Kementerian Dalam Negeri

data.name: Ministry of Justice & Human Rights/ Kementerian Hukum Dan Hak
data.description: Company registration is done through Ministry of Justice & Human Rights/ Kementerian Hukum Dan Hak

data.name: Ministry of Foreign affairs/ Kementerian Luar Negeri
data.description: International NGO registration is done through Ministry of Foreign affairs/ Kementerian Luar Negeri

data.name: NGOs registered at Provinicial Level
data.description: Registration for NGO in Indonesia can be done at the provincial level. Because there is regional autonomy, each provincial has different requirements. Website is just one example

data.name: Israeli Corporations Authority (Department of Justice) also known as The Registrar of Companies (ROC)
data.description: The register can be searched at http://havarot.justice.gov.il/ using part or all of a company name in English or Hebrew, or by entering the company number. The search interface and the results are in Hebrew. Free information on a company includes type of company, address, legal status and purpose of the company. Additional information such as details of directors, total authorized capital, division of share capital, shareholders, charges and liabilities is priced.

data.name: Isle of Man Index of Registered Charities
Government of India, Minstry of Corporate Affairs
data.description: MCA regulates corporate affairs in India through the Companies Act, 1956, 2013 and other allied Acts, Bills and Rules.

data.name: The business register of the Italian Chambers of Commerce
data.description: Access to the register and to limited information (such as name and address of company) is free of charge. Registration is also free of charge. However, on-line access to complete information is available only by pay on demand.

A code allocated to a company by the Japanese National Tax Agency. The registry itself is open and searchable by JCN (in Japanese only), but only limited information is available. More information on the corporate number (JCN) can be found here - http://www.nta.go.jp/foreign_language/corporate_number/ (National Tax Agency website).
data.name: JCN (Japanese Corporate Number). Japanese Corporate Registry - Houjintouki (法人登記)
Бизнес сәйкестендіру номері (БИН) / Business Identification Number (BIN)
data.description: A unique code every legal entity or an individual enterpreneur must obtain.

data.name: Lesotho Council of Non Governmental Organisations
Juridinių asmenų dalyvių informacinė sistema/Information Platform of Legal Entities
data.description: The Register of Legal Entities registers businesses, institutions and NGOs and collects detailed data about Lithuanian legal entities as well as branches and representative offices of foreign companies and organizations. The Register contains complete information (and historical data) about legal form and status of legal entities, fields of its activity, size and structure of the authorized capital, members of sole and collective management bodies, licenses acquired, etc. It is obligatory for the most of business companies to submit annual financial statements to the Register of Legal Entities since 2004. Starting from March 2010 private limited liability companies are obliged to declare current list of shareholders to the Register.

data.name: Register of Enterprises of the Republic of Latvia
data.description: Free of charge information includes type of legal entity; registered office; new or current name or trade name and previously registered or historical name or trade name; registration number; Single Euro Payment Area beneficiary identification code (if allocated); registration date; date of deletion of the legal entity from the register (or the date of reorganisation if the reason for the deletion is a reorganisation); deadline for registration of religious organisations that are subject to re-registration.

data.name: State Chamber of Registration of the Republic of Moldova, Ministry of Justice
data.description: General information about the legal entities incorporated on the Republic of Moldova’s territory, except political parties, non-governmental organizations and press agencies. Data from the State Chamber of Registration is published once per month on the Government Portal of Open Data http://date.gov.md/ckan/ro/dataset/11736-date-din-registrul-de-stat-al-unitatilor-de-drept-privind-intreprinderile-inregistrate-in-repu and can be searched in a convenient way via dedicated platform http://www.idno.md/.

data.name: Ministry of Home Affairs - Central Committee for the Registration and Supervision of Organisations
data.url: No url for the ministry (as at 2/10/2013)
data.description: The MHA assigns a registration number to each NGO - this number is time limited, for example 4 years, after which the registration is reviewed.

data.name: The Council for Non Governmental Organisations in Malawi
NGO Board of Malawi
data.description: There is a pdf file with a list of registered NGOs, but these do not appear to be registration numbers. New database is planned

data.name: Pakistan Centre for Philanthropy
data.description: The PCP Certification Programme seeks to bring transparency, accountability and good governance in the nonprofit sector in Pakistan. The first initiative of its kind in South Asia; it involves the evaluation of a nonprofit organisation on standardised parameters of internal governance, financial management and programme delivery.

data.name: Pakistan Voluntary Social Welfare Agency
data.description: All NGOs are required to register with their local Voluntary Social Welfare department

data.name: National Official Business Register
data.description: Every business entry in Poland is assigned an ID in 3 different registries:business, court, and tax. This is the business register.

data.name: Tax Identification Number
data.description: Every business entry in Poland is assigned an ID in 3 different registries:business, court, and tax. This is the tax register.

data.name: The National Court Register
data.description: Every business entry in Poland is assigned an ID in 3 different registries:business, court, and tax. This is the court register.

data.name: National Trade Register Office, Ministry of Finance
Serbian Business Registrations Agency (APR)
data.description: The SBRA runs business registers as single, centralized, public electronic databases.

data.name: Uniform State Register of Legal Entities of Russian Federation
Uniform State Register of Legal Entities of Russian Federation
Accounting and Corporate Regulatory Authority (ACRA)
data.description: The Accounting and Corporate Regulatory Authority (ACRA) is the national regulator of business entities, public accountants and corporate service providers in Singapore

data.name: Company Identification Number/Matična številka
data.description: The Slovenian Business Register (PRS) is a central database containing information about all business entities involved in a profit or non-profit activity having their principal place of business located on the territory of the Republic of Slovenia, as well as information on their subsidiaries and other divisions of business entities performing business activities in the territory of the Republic of Slovenia.

data.name: Tax Identification Number/Davčna številka, Ministry of Finance of the Republic of Slovenia
data.description: A unique code every legal entity or an individual enterpreneur must obtain.

data.name: Slovakia Ministry Of Interior Trade Register
data.description: Most organisations (including NGOs) have to be registered with the Ministry of Interior for the Trade Register Of The Slovak Republic (Živnostensky Register Slovenskej Republiky) and are allocated a unique registration number

data.name: MERSIS - central trade registry system / Merkezi Sicil Kayıt Sistemi
data.description: Central Trade Registry System (MERSIS) is a centralized information system allowing for the implementation of the commercial registry processes and storing them and commercial registry data electronically. Mersis may be reached by the username-password or the e-signature from the website address of Ministry of Customs and Trade. It contains titles of companies, addresses, contact information, capital information, companies' partners, joint capital information, field of business, executive bodies of companies. Some information can also be found at http://www.ticaretsicil.gov.tr/english/index.php

data.name: Vergi Kimlik Numarası - VAT
data.description:
All resident legal entities obtain a TIN (Vergi Kimlik Numarasi) automatically since they are subject to tax. Although legal
arrangements like ordinary partnerships are not subject to corporate income tax, TIN is issued to
them while registering to local tax offices. Consists of 10 digits. Information can be found at http://mersis.gumrukticaret.gov.tr/Login/tabid/110/Default.aspx?returnurl=%2fMersis%2f%C5%9EirketSorgulama.aspx. Only in Turkish, not available to the broad audience.

data.name: Tanzania Business Registrations and Licensing Agency
NGO Board, Ministry of Internal Affairs
Corporation registration is the responsibility of each state (see link)
Internal Revenue Service / Employer Identification Number
Index of U.S. Government Departments and Agencies
data.description: Use the final segment of the url (below /federal and excluding the extension) as the "registration number", converting all "-" to "_". Keep "registration number" portion all lowercase.

data.name: International Aid Transparency Initiative Organisation Identifier
data.description: XI-IATI is a list of organisation identifiers that is maintained by the IATI Secretariat. Any publisher may apply to the IATI Technical Team for an identifier to be generated.

data.name: Public Bodies
data.description: Public Bodies aims to provide a unique ID for every part of every government.

data.name: OECD Development Assistance Committee
data.description: See Donor, Agency, and Delivery Channel codes

data.name: Economic Operators Identification and Registration system
data.description: This site allows to validate EORI numbers and provides access to the information related to Authorised Economic Operators (AEO). An EORI number is unique throughout the EU, assigned by a customs authority in a member state to economic operators (businesses) or persons.

data.name: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs
data.description: OCHA is the part of the United Nations Secretariat responsible for bringing together humanitarian actors to ensure a coherent response to emergencies.

data.name: SA Revenue Service Tax Exemption Unit / Public Benefit Organisations

metadata.name: Organisation Registration Agency
metadata.description:
Organisation registry agencies and their code. These can be used as the
        prefix for an organisation identifier.

        For general guidance about constructing Organisation Identifiers, please see http://iatistandard.org/organisation-identifiers/

        In this list, description contains IATI specific usage notes, rather
        than a general description of the regsitration agency.

        The categories on this list are ISO Country codes, except for XM which
        is used to indicate Multilateral/International Agency, and XI which is 
        used to indicate International Organisations. This follows ISO's 
        convention of reserving codes starting with X for "private use".

        This list is maintained by the IATI Secretariat, but is a "NonEmbedded"
        codelist - which means changes and additions may be made at short
        notice, outside of published decimal and integer upgrade schedules.  If
        a Registation Agency that you wish to use is not on this list, please
        contact support@iatistandard.org
        
        This list was previously located at:
        https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AnWngmdQt3stdFppMWdkcXJqVTRWTk9menR1N0FXNGc&usp=drive_web#gid=0
